tables.title: Table_6_5_Annual_Failure_Rate_AFR
tables.table_md:
| Requirement ID | Description | | :--- | :--- | | REL-1 | The device shall meet an MTBF of 2.5 million hours (AFR of <= 0.35% per JEDEC JESD 218) under the following environmental conditions:
Specification Environment Requirement
Temperature Operational • 0°C to 50°C (32°F to 122°F)
• < 20°C (68°F) per hour gradient
Non-Operational • -40°C to 70°C (-40°F to 158°F)
• < 30°C (86°F) per hour gradient
Humidity Operational • 10% to 90% non-condensing
• Yearly weighted average: < 80% RH
o 90% of year: < 80%
o 10% of year: 80% to 90%
• Maximum dewpoint: 29.4°C (85°F)
| | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |
